title: hey riot cloud you please make full metal vi?
body:
well i think it would be an awesome tribute to the cool skins that are coming out and well it would be sick having {{champion:254}}  having a full metal skin the coluor  would be just amazing  so i hope u make it and if you do i would love to know because I'm think off starting maining her if she gets a cool skin that can punch somebody face in just by looking at it :D 
p.s love the new sr looks sooooooooo awesome and any news or magma chamber really would like to see it and ao shin

replies.body: Headhunter Caitlyn and Fullmetal Jayce already exist... which makes me think this is something they should do, or at least along the lines of this. It would be cool, and would fit with the bit of a theme they have there.

Unfortunately Riot rushes into making decisions for skin concepts without taking a proper look at pre-existing creations most of the time. There was a Vi skin concept around 1 year+ ago for Vi with Blitz's fists as gloves and a Blitz hoodie on.
hey that sounds pretty cool could you send me a link?
She already has a lot of skins considering how long she has been out. And debonaire Vi came out not that long ago.
yeah i know but i just find it irresistible too look at i mean come on as if you don't want that  its pretty {{summoner:4}}
